introduction: This video provides useful tips for transitioning from testing to data science. It covers the importance of figuring out your desired role, learning Python and data science skills, participating in competitions, and building your network. The video emphasizes the importance of inter-department transfers within a company and offers examples of successful transitions. It also encourages viewers to be thoughtful about the time and money required for the transition.

sections.title: Section 1: Understanding the Transition
content: The transition from testing to data science is possible and many have made this transition.
Bindiya Rajendran, who made the transition after eight years as a software test engineer, shares her story on analytics vidhya.
The video provides an overview of various data science roles such as data analyst, data engineer, and data scientist.
Starting with data analyst can be easier for those with strong math and statistics skills.
topics: Transition from Testing to Data Science

sections.title: Section 2: Learning Data Science Skills
content: Learning data science skills is crucial for the transition.
Python and pandas are useful for basic data analysis in a database.
Using bi tools like Power BI or Tableau can also help with data analysis.
Building a dashboard using sales data is a helpful project for learning data science skills.

sections.title: Section 3: Participating in Competitions
content: Participating in competitions can help improve your data science skills.
Kegel participation on kegelcom can help build your reputation in data science.
Tanul Singh, a mechanical engineer, built a good reputation on kegel after studying mechanical engineering and participating in competitions.
Internships can also be helpful for learning and gaining experience in data science.

sections.title: Section 4: Building Your Network
content: Building your network can help with finding job opportunities in data science.
Codebasics has a discord server where you can build your linkedin network.
Intersharla and other portals can help with finding internships.
Being thoughtful about taking a salary cut for an internship can lead to better opportunities.

sections.title: Section 5: Overcoming Challenges
content: The transition from testing to data science can take time and may involve rejection from jobs.
Using the time to improve your data science skills and contribute to open-source projects can help.
Participating in competitions and building your network can also help with the transition.
Eventually, persistence and dedication can lead to better job opportunities in data science.

topics: Transition from Testing to Data Science

generalTopics.name: Transitioning from Testing to Data Science
